column3: str
The Dotharli warrior wants to see just how capable you are.
Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
Head for the Dusk Throne without straying from the designated path.
Obtain the small leather sack.
Present the small leather sack to the Dotharli warrior.
Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
Head for the Dusk Throne without straying from the designated path.
Obtain the small leather sack.
Present the small leather sack to the Dotharli warrior.
Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
You are a <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> that has danced with death many a time. I can tell from your eyes.
We Dotharl respect all skilled warriors equally. Race does not come into it. I would very much like to witness your strength firsthand.

Should you be willing, I would have you participate in a trial. It should be no trouble for you─it is a test made for our tribe's youngest. You simply need head to the Dusk Throne and collect a small package.
Speak with me if you feel up to the challenge.
Ready to test your might? Head for the Dusk Throne's chest and bring back the sack I have placed there.
Deviate from the path and you shall fail the trial. You may attempt the test as many times as you like.
Head for the goal, taking care not to step outside of the designated path. Riding on a mount shall also cause you to fail the trial. Talk with the Dotharli warrior if you wish to reattempt the test.
Do not lose heart. You may attempt the trial as many times as you wish.
Do you have the sack? Only it can serve as proof that you have passed the test.
Do you have the sack? Only it can serve as proof that you have passed the test.
Skillfully done. Let us return to Dotharl Khaa.
The trial tests participants' bravery and their ability to cope with unforeseen obstacles. As I expected, it did not trouble you in the slightest.
Dotharl who complete the trial receive no rewards, but as you are an outsider, I will make an exception.
I shall not forget you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. You will always be welcome in Dotharl Khaa.
